description:
Ever build a WordPress website and realize you then wanted to move it to a new domain? Or new server? Or maybe move it from your computer to a live server?

This course focuses on how to easily transfer your WordPress website, including the plugins, themes, core files, and most importantly the database.

If you are planning to start freelancing or working as a developer, this information is highly needed and used all the time!

The course tailors to both the easy method using WordPress, and then the manual method through cPanel for a comprehensive overview.

After the course and a little practise, you should be transferring websites like a pro! I can transfer a website in 15 minutes using these simple steps!
title: How to easily move a WordPress Website
